columns.docname: CASE OF LECHNER AND HESS v. AUSTRIA
columns.scl: Zimmermann and Steiner judgment of 13 July 1983, Series A no. 66, pp. 11, 13, 14, paras. 24, 32, 36;Buchholz judgment of 6 May 1981, Series A no. 42, p. 16, para. 50;Guincho judgment of 10 July 1984, Series A no. 81, pp. 14, 16, paras. 32, 38;Eckle judgment of 15 July 1982, Series A no. 51, p. 36, para. 82;Sporrong and Lönnroth judgment of 18 December 1984, Series A no. 88, p. 13, para. 25;Bönisch judgment of 2 June 1986, Series A no. 103, p. 8, para. 13
columns.conclusion: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Criminal proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time);Pecuniary and non-pecuniary damage - award (Article 41 - Non-pecuniary damage;Pecuniary damage;Just satisfaction)
columns.externalsources: Code of Civil Procedure, Article 191

columns.conclusion: Struck out of the list (friendly settlement)
